ac: 20, touch 15, flat-footed 15 (+4 armor, +4 Dex, +1 dodge, +1 natural)
treasure: standard (chain shirt, mwk longsword, longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

spells.spell-like abilities:
(CL 10th; concentration +12)

At will-dancing lights

1/day-confusion (DC 16), deep slumber (DC 15), entangle (DC 13), glitterdust (DC 14), major image (DC 15)

feats: Agile Maneuvers, Dodge, Flyby Attack, Skill Focus (Perception), Weapon Finesse
description: This tall, regal woman is clad in a long cloak of pristine white swan feathers and silvery armor with a winged helm.

sections.body: Without her feather cloak, a swan maiden can't use her change shape ability.
sections.name: Feather Cloak

sections.body: A swan maiden can transform a willing good female humanoid into a swan maiden via a ritual that takes 24 hours. The humanoid loses her class and racial abilities.
sections.name: Transformation Ritual

sections.body: Swan maidens are fey shapechangers who vow to protect unspoiled wilds from the encroachment of civilization or evil. They live in small flocks along secluded lakeshores. Because stealing a swan maiden's cloak robs her of her shapechanging ability, most maidens avoid humanoids and take up armor and weapons to defend themselves.

special_qualities: change shape (trumpeter swan, beast shape I), feather cloak, trackless step, transformation ritual
name: Swan Maiden
skills: Acrobatics +11, Bluff +10, Fly +20, Knowledge (nature) +8, Perception +14, Sense Motive +9, Stealth +20
